name: dreamwalker (itch) (NoUCorn)
description:
Thanks Icoso for the jam!

there is not that much to see but I had a lot of fun just playtesting the mechanics.

EDIT: Leave your Speedrun times in the comments. (in sec.)

Beginner: 69.42

Speedy Boi: 52.52

Professional Speedruner: 36.68

Zoomin' (my best time): 22.13 (holy shit what am I doing with my life, grinding away this little game. its so fun tho)

Warning: if you tab out of the game it might come to audio problems which will fix itself after a few seconds
